category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCViewEnableResponseOnSelection
preference.preference_description: Provides a central control to enable response in the primary view, when selecting in the secondary view in the rich client. Valid values are the view IDs of the primary views (e.g. the view ID for TCComponentView is "com.teamcenter.rac.ui.views.TCComponentView"). After modifying this preference, you need to reset the perspective or restart the rich client.
